description:
This course will take you on a journey of understanding men and relationships, and mastering your ability to take control in a healthy and productive way. 

This course is broken into three modules which provide valuable information via video. There are also useful exercises included to maximize success. 

You will learn:

  • Find success with love
  • Get him to propose
  • Understand how men operate
  • Why men cheat
  • How to prevent a man from cheating
  • How to understand masculine and feminine energy and how it effects love 
  • The secret formula for a lasting marriage and commitment
title: Get Him To Propose! Understand Men From The Inside Out!
